nodes.text: Star Wars Search and Find Volume I

Star Wars Search and Find Volume I is a search and find book including scenes from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace to Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. It was released on April 9, 2019.
Get ready for a galactic search-and-find adventure in Star Wars Search and Find Vol. I!

Travel across the universe and explore scenes from Star Wars Episodes I–VII in this fun, illustrated search-and-find collection! Search for Chewbacca at Jabba's shindig on Tatooine, find Resistance hero Han Solo among X-wing pilots on D'Qar, and scavenge the desert of Jakku for BB-8, among other classic scenes. Then hit the hyperdrive and blast to the back of the book for more search-and-find adventures.
